title: Delamu Under-Sink Organizers: Clear Drawers That Actually Pull Out Smoothly
metaDescription: These clear acrylic under-sink organizers with pull-out drawers and dividers help maximize bathroom and kitchen storage space effectively.
content:
## Build Quality and Materials

These organizers feel more solid than typical plastic storage bins. The clear acrylic construction is thick enough that it doesn't flex when you load them up with bottles and supplies. Each drawer slides on small plastic runners that work surprisingly smoothly - no sticking or jamming like cheaper alternatives I've tried.

The moveable dividers are a nice touch. They're not flimsy plastic strips but actual partitions that snap into grooves along the bottom. You can create different sized compartments based on what you're storing, which beats fixed sections that never quite fit your stuff.

## Installation and Setup

No assembly required - these come ready to use. The stackable design means you can use them side by side or one on top of the other, depending on your cabinet height. I used mine under the bathroom sink where the plumbing creates awkward spaces. The rectangular shape fits better than round organizers that waste corner space.

Measuring your cabinet first is essential. These aren't tiny, so make sure you've got the clearance for the drawer to extend fully. I learned this the hard way with my first attempt at placement.

## Daily Use Experience

The pull-out function works well for accessing items stored in the back. Instead of moving everything in front to reach something, you just slide the whole drawer out. This is particularly useful under sinks where you're working in cramped, dimly lit spaces.

The clear sides make it easy to spot what you need without pulling drawers out completely. I can see my hair products, cleaning supplies, or whatever else is stored without playing the guessing game.

## Storage Capacity

Each organizer holds a decent amount - I fit about 8-10 standard sized bottles and containers in one drawer with the dividers arranged efficiently. The depth accommodates most bathroom and cleaning products without wasting vertical space.

The stackable feature doubles your storage capacity if you have the cabinet height. My upstairs bathroom cabinet is tall enough for stacking, but the kitchen sink area isn't, so I use them side by side there.

## Anti-Slip Performance

The bottom has small rubber feet that do help prevent sliding, though they're not miraculous. On smooth cabinet surfaces, the organizers stay put reasonably well. If your cabinet floor is particularly slick, you might want to add some grip strips.

The drawers themselves don't slip out accidentally - there's enough friction in the sliding mechanism to keep them closed during normal cabinet door opening and closing.

## Cleaning and Maintenance

Clear acrylic shows water spots and fingerprints easily, but it cleans up with basic household cleaners. The smooth surfaces don't trap dirt or grime like textured plastic containers do.

The dividers pop out for thorough cleaning if needed, which is helpful when storing potentially messy items like hair styling products or cleaning supplies.

## Value for a Two-Pack

Getting two units gives you flexibility in arrangement. You can dedicate one to frequently used items and another to backup supplies, or separate different categories of products. Having the pair means you can organize more systematically than with just one drawer.
pros: Thick acrylic construction feels durable and substantial
Smooth pull-out mechanism doesn't stick or jam during use
Moveable dividers create customizable compartment sizes
Clear sides allow easy identification of stored items
Stackable design maximizes vertical storage space
Two-pack provides flexibility for different organizational setups
Anti-slip feet keep organizers stable in most cabinets
cons: Clear acrylic shows water spots and fingerprints easily
Requires adequate cabinet depth for full drawer extension
Anti-slip feet work better on some cabinet surfaces than others
verdict: These organizers solve the common under-sink storage problem with a practical pull-out design and quality construction. The clear acrylic and moveable dividers make organization straightforward, though you'll need to wipe them down regularly to keep them looking clean.
targetAudience: Homeowners with under-sink storage challenges, renters looking for non-permanent organization solutions, and anyone wanting to maximize cabinet space in bathrooms or kitchens
